jobs_results.title: (Junior) Android Developer (m/f/d) Community
jobs_results.description:
Share
Zentrale
MÃ¼nchen
Apply now
Summary
Junior
Vollzeit
Festanstellung
About this job

CHECK24 is a familiar brand. But what is behind it? Agile, small IT teams, strong development prospects and digital pioneers thanks to smart, committed minds. Be part of it! Join us to build the app from scratch and drive the development of our new product - We have big plans.
The position offers you a high level of technical responsibility, you can expect a dynamic environment with exciting challenges. We are looking forward to your application as (Junior) Android Developer (m/f/d) at CHECK24 Community GmbH.

Your Qualifications
First experience in Android development with good knowledge in Kotlin and experience with the web technologies REST and JSON
Good know-how in object-oriented programming, software architectures and design patterns
Having a good grasp of modern app technologies (Dagger, Jetpack Compose, ...)
Experience with Unit Testing, UI Testing
Fluent in written and spoken English (German is a bonus)
Your Responsibilities
Implementation and design of innovative features for our Android native app
Share your ideas with the team and contribute to our global app architecture (MVVM)
Plan and discuss all necessary requirements with our product managers to create a unique customer experience
Determine the ideal approach to solve technical problems together with your team
Support the continuous learning process of the whole team by sharing knowledge and your ideas
Your Benefits
Modern working: A flexible working hours model with a home office arrangement ("4+1"), the possibility to work up to two weeks per year flexibly from home
Your development is important for us: Individual development and training opportunities through our strong and sustainable growth. We also support you with internal and external professional training as well as regular feedback sessions to identify and develop your strengths and potential
We value your commitment: Permanent employment-contract with an attractive and performance-oriented salary package, including annual bonuses for special achievements. Vouchers for numerous CHECK24 products, company-subsidized bicycle rental, a corporate subsidized pension scheme and a subsidized MVV ticket are on top
Your ideas are important to us and are implemented quickly: Independent, agile work with the contribution of your own ideas in small teams with a strong team spirit. Short decision processes are a matter of course for us
We equip you: Ergonomic workstation with modern equipment, including a MacBook, two additional monitors and height-adjustable desks from the first day of work
Here you can feel comfortable: Our extensive range of drinks and fresh fruit keep you energized. Once a week, we serve a free, varied lunch
We are also a great team outside of work: Numerous events to celebrate and network, as well as our legendary summer and Christmas parties
Contact
Fabian Stechele
fabian.stechele@check24.de
Send us applications only through our online application form, please.
Apply now
zu allen Blogartikeln

jobs_results.title: Android Developer (m/f)
jobs_results.description:
This ad goes out to all those who want to find a purpose in what theyâre doing and take accountability for their work.

At Blinkist, weâve created a meaningful product that is growing fast. Our blinks â key insights from the worldâs best nonfiction â help more than 3 million people around the globe to keep learning new, exciting things each and every day.

In 2017, our app received the World Summit Award, granted by the United Nations, in the Learning & Education category, as well as a Google Material Design Award for Brand Expressiveness.

Why do we need you?

Blinkist is growing quickly and we are looking for an Android Developer to help accelerate our ability to deliver a top-notch product to our users. This is where you come in. You will ship features that affect million of users and revenue while playing with the latest technologies â our minSdkVersion is 16 â Jelly Bean.

As one of our Android developers you will:

Take responsibility in driving the Blinkist Android App from day 1
â¢ Implement new features & polish the app by increasing stability, fixing bugs and thinking about the user experience
â¢ Interact closely with designers & product managers to propose Android-suitable solutions
â¢ Conduct code reviews and participate in regular standups to ensure quality and alignment

To do this, we believe you should have:
â¢ 3+ years of Android specific development experience
â¢ Strong experience with RxJava and testing (Espresso, JUnit)
â¢ Some experience with Kotlin would be a plus
â¢ Familiarity with Dagger and Gradle
â¢ Passion for writing clean architecture and easily-testable code
â¢ Be keen to work with best-practice agile development methods and to increase the team's effectiveness with each release

Whatâs in it for you?

At Blinkist, we offer a fantastic workplace in the heart of Berlin-NeukÃ¶lln including all the benefits youâd expect â from a personalized perk system to free drinks, fresh fruit, and furious foosball fights, plus the nicest, smartest bunch of coworkers. Add a competitive salary, flexible working hours, and a meaningful product on the rise, and you have a first impression of why Blinkist is a great place to work.

We got rid of classical management hierarchies and, instead, distributed authority among all colleagues. We foster a unique company culture championing self-empowerment, personal development, direct communication and mutual support. Not only do we want you to grow into the role of Android Developer, but we want this role to grow with you.

If weâve captured your interest and you want to be part of a rapidly-growing, popular and valuable product, apply now and let us know why youâre the perfect fit for the job!

jobs_results.title: Senior Android Engineer (m/f/d)
jobs_results.description:
Your mission

Your mission as a Senior Android Engineer at Carly is to shape impactful automotive-tech consumer products globally. Bring your collaborative problem-solving skills to a dynamic environment, crafting high-quality solutions that redefine the automotive-tech landscape. Join us on this innovation journey and make a real difference.

Your responsibilities
â¢ Spearhead solutions for advanced application-specific challenges across the entire stack while keeping the user experience responsive on all Android-supported devices
â¢ Work closely with our dynamic engineering team and seamlessly communicate with cross-functional partners, turning ideas into innovative solutions.
â¢ Collaborating with our UX designers to implement designs and user flows that resonate with our audience.
â¢ Own projects to the release-ready stage.
â¢ Discover, evaluate and implement new solutions to make development efficient.
â¢ Help maintain code quality, organisation and automation.

Your profile
â¢ 5+ years of experience in Android programming, demonstrating proficiency in Java and Kotlin.
â¢ BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related subject.
â¢ Strong understanding of Android UI implementation.
â¢ Experience in consumer-oriented applications development or high interest in working in the B2C market.
â¢ Strong experience working in teams on complex projects in an AGILE environment.
â¢ Genuine interest in empowering a team and supporting them with their own technical expertise.
â¢ Passion for technology, automotive and consumer products.

Why us?
â¢ An inclusive company culture and passion-driven people
â¢ High impact and responsibility in a very successful and fast-growing company and brand
â¢ Strong management team with proven track record in successful startups to learn from
â¢ A competitive compensation and 100% fully supported company equipment
â¢ A high learning curve with all the possibilities for personal growth and professional development
â¢ No walls, no limits, no bureaucracy just unlimited potential
â¢ The nicest and most international team in the stylish brand-new office, in the heart of Munich with an amazing view on the Alps
â¢ To learn more about our vibrant company culture feel free to visit our Career & Culture page.

jobs_results.title: Android Team Lead / Lead Developer - Kotlin with Automotive. Job in DÃ¼sseldorf News10 Jobs
jobs_results.description:
Project Description:

This is a good opportunity to participate in the new in-vehicle infotainment (IVI) project for one of the biggest European car maker. This is a very fast growing project which require talented software developers and test engineers who likes challenges and new cutting edge technologies. Applicant will have the possibility to gain experience in development or integrating/testing of different functionalities. Candidate will be part of the international team and have the opportunity to work with the latest software technologies like Android Automotive OS.

Responsibilities:
â¢ To develop Navigation Controller based on the one of the most advanced navigation platform, to create innovative in-car experiences with a range of services including maps, live traffic, POI search, routing and more
â¢ Help with drive architectural direction and decisions
â¢ Develop components\classes according to the architecture agreed on Architecture Board
â¢ Working closely with Development, Testers, Architects, and Product Owners throughout the development lifecycle to deliver high quality software on time
â¢ Participation in peer reviews, estimation, and other engineering activities
â¢ Mentor and assist other engineers in or out of your areas of ownership and expertise
â¢ Contribute towards continual improvement of organizational products and processes

Mandatory Skills Description:
â¢ 5+ years of engineering experience
â¢ 3+ years of experience in automotive
â¢ 3+ years of experience with Kotlin
â¢ HMI knowledge
â¢ Strong Soft skills

Nice-to-Have Skills Description:
â¢ Experience working in an Agile/Scrum environment
â¢ Knowledge and insight into ASPICE
â¢ Excellent interpersonal skills and high motivation
â¢ 1+ years' experience in navigation area

Languages:
â¢ English: C1 Advanced

Life @ Crypto.com

Empowered to think big. Try new opportunities while working with a talented, ambitious and supportive team.

Transformational and proactive working environment. Elevate employees to find thoughtful and innovative solutions.

Growth from within. We help to develop new skill-sets that would impact the shaping of your personal and professional growth.

Work Culture. Our colleagues are some of the best in the industry; we are all here to help and support one another.

One cohesive team. Engage stakeholders to achieve our ultimate goal - Cryptocurrency in every wallet.

Are you ready to kickstart your future with us?

Medical insurance package with extended coverage to dependents

Attractive annual leave entitlement including: birthday, work anniversary

About Crypto.com:

Founded in 2016, Crypto.com serves more than 80 million customers and is the world's fastest growing global cryptocurrency platform. Our vision is simple: Cryptocurrency in Every Walletâ¢. Crypto.com is an equal opportunities employer and we are committed to creating an environment where opportunities are presented to everyone in a fair and transparent way. jobs_results.title: Android/Angular Frontend Developer (all genders) (Frontend-Entwickler/in)
jobs_results.description:
Introduction

About our principlesAmbitious, promising and always on the move: That is SYNAOS. We are a team of over 100 people from 15 nations. We stick together and all work for the same goal: to turn an entire industry upside down. Can you identify with our priciples?

â¢ We go above & beyond for our customers

â¢ We always push forward

â¢ We make informed decisions

â¢ We challenge each other and win together

â¢ We seize ownership

â¢ We make bold movesAbout us SYNAOS is transforming Intralogistics. SYNAOS is at the forefront of advancing automation and digitalization in intralogistics. The intralogistics software company from Hanover directly influences how goods are manufactured in factories and moved in warehouses. Our intelligent and scalable SaaS solution, the Intralogistics Management Platform (IMP) , automates intralogistics processes and orchestrates complex material flows in production sites and logistics centers.With us, you have the opportunity to join and shape the rapid development of a deep-tech software scale-up from Germany. We place great emphasis on teamwork and innovation, providing a motivating and flexible work environment that fosters creativity and collaboration. Working at SYNAOS is more than just a job â you will be at the forefront of technological progress in the intralogistics industry.If you resonate with our vision and want to actively shape the future of intralogistics, we should talk!

Your tasks

Your roleAs Android / Angular Frontend Developer you will hold two positions. You will work in a team with developers, product managers and UI/UX designers to further develop our Intralogistics Workers Android app and develop the user interfaces of our Intralogistics Management Platform (web development). Collaborate with team members through pair programming, code reviews, and knowledge-sharing sessions to help your team solve problems of any kind.Your missionâ¢ You will further develop our Intralogistics Workers Android app in Kotlin and you will work on the frontend of our Intralogistics Management Platform

â¢ You are responsible for code reviews and testing of the app

â¢ You are responsible for writing unit tests

â¢ You are co-responsible for planning the REST interface between app and backend

â¢ You collaborate with our Designers using Figma

â¢ Exchange with the customer and occasional appointments on site

Your profile

â¢ You have at least 2-3 years of working experience in the development of modern Android concepts

â¢ You are very familiar with Kotlin and Java

â¢ You already have experience with Google Firebase, Android Jetpack library, Retrofit

â¢ Ideally, you already have experience with Docker, Kubernetes as well as CI/CD processes and GitLab

â¢ Working with GIT, JUnit4 and Figma is not new to you

â¢ You have a basic understanding of UI/UX and reactive programming

â¢ With your knowledge of TypeScript and basics in HTML and CSS/SASS, you gained experience in creating single-page applications. You have experience using SPA frameworks such as Angular, React or Vue.js.

â¢ Communication in German or English is no problem for you

â¢ Your analytical mindset, creativity and communication skills support you in your daily work

Perks & Benefits

â¢ Flexible organization of your workday (choose between remote or office work)

â¢ Modern office in the heart of Hanover for hybrid working

â¢ Up to 180 days (6 months) working from abroad

â¢ Competitive compensation with benefits offering

â¢ 30 days (6 weeks) of paid vacation

â¢ Modern hardware and software solutions

â¢ Corporate Benefits: Access to exclusive employee discounts and special offers from a wide range of partner companies.

Contact

Contact personSYNAOS GmbHjoin-us@synaos.com

jobs_results.title: Senior Android Engineer - Mobile Platform
jobs_results.description:
About the team:

As a Senior Android Engineer in the Mobile Platform Squad, youâll be part of the backbone of Mobile Engineering at SumUp. Your team is responsible for creating and maintaining the development environment that enables Mobile Developers to ship high-quality products efficiently. Youâll also provide help and guidance to SumUppers interacting with our mobile apps.

Our engineering culture is autonomous and driven by collaboration and innovation. Youâll connect with mobile engineers across the organization as your initiatives are far-reaching. The squad focuses on:
â¢ Maintaining CI/CD pipelines for mobile projects.
â¢ Building tools and infrastructure to enhance the developer experience.
â¢ Supporting and improving the codebase across SumUp's mobile apps.
â¢ Driving long-term technical impact at scale across the company.

What youâll do:
â¢ Shape the core experience of merchants and developers interacting with SumUpâs Android ecosystem.
â¢ Develop and maintain tools, frameworks, and infrastructure that enhance the consistency, scalability, and reliability of our mobile apps.
â¢ Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product, design, and backend, to deliver seamless experiences.
â¢ Work on CI/CD systems, developer tooling, and performance optimizations to streamline mobile development processes.
â¢ Mentor team members and provide technical guidance across projects.
â¢ Maintain a high bar for engineering excellence and continually raise it by introducing new technologies and best practices.
â¢ Own technical projects from idea to implementation, ensuring they align with business needs and technical standards.

Youâll be great for this position if you have:
â¢ 5+ years of professional Android development experience, with expertise in Kotlin and modern Android frameworks.
â¢ Experienced in CI/CD pipelines, with tools like Github Actions, Fastlane, or similar platforms.
â¢ A deep understanding of testing methodologies and best practices, including writing unit and UI tests.
â¢ Experienced with modern architecture and design patterns.
â¢ Youâre passionate about developer experience, creating tools, and improving workflows for engineers.
â¢ Strong collaboration skills and enjoy mentoring and guiding other engineers.
â¢ Experience with modularized codebases, building and maintaining internal tooling, or SDK development is a plus.

Nice to have:
â¢ Experience providing modules/SDKs to be used by other Mobile Engineers
â¢ Experience with Fastlane and Ruby
â¢ Experience Kotlin Multiplatform

Why you should join SumUp:

ð Opportunity to work with SumUppers globally on large-scale fintech products used by millions of businesses worldwide, from our Berlin or Cologne offices. This involves an office-first setup.

ð Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion: Be part of a workplace that values and promotes diversity, fostering an inclusive environment where everyone's perspectives are respected and embraced

ð A dedicated annual L&D budget of â¬2,000 for attending conferences and/or advancing your career through further education.

ð Enrolment onto our VSOP program: You will own a stake in SumUpâs future success

ð¶ A corporate pension scheme where we match up to 20% of your contributions

ð 30 Days Sabbatical: Enjoy the unique opportunity to take a well-deserved break with our 30 days sabbatical benefit after completing 3 years of employment with SumUp.

ð Referral Bonus: Earn additional rewards by referring talented individuals to join the SumUp team.

ðµð¾ââï¸ Numerous other benefits such as Urban Sports Club subsidy, Kita placement assistance, subsidised office lunches.

About us:

SumUp is a leading financial technology company, founded in 2012 with the goal of empowering small businesses around the globe. Weâre the financial partner of choice for more than 4 million merchants in over 35 markets. We collectively build, plan and fine-tune the technology that drives SumUp and empowers small businesses around the world.

We believe in the everyday hero. Those who have the courage to follow their passion and who have the strength and determination to realise their dreams. Small business owners are at the heart of all we do, so we're creating powerful, easy-to-use financial solutions to help them run their business. With a founders mentality and a 'team-first attitude' our diverse teams across Europe, South America, and the United States work together to ensure that small business owners can be successful doing what they love.

SumUp is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer that proudly pursues and hires a diverse workforce. SumUp does not make hiring or employment decisions on the basis of race, colour, religion or religious belief, ethnic or national origin, nationality, sex, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability, age or any other basis protected by applicable laws or prohibited by Company policy. SumUp also strives for a healthy and safe workplace and strictly prohibits harassment of any kind.
